titles: The history of Antonio and Mellida. The first part. As it hath beene sundry times acted, by the children of Paules. Written by I.M.
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: Printed [by R. Bradock] for Mathewe Lownes, and Thomas Fisher, and are to be soulde in Saint Dunstans Church-yarde,
notes: Running title reads: The first part of Antonio and Mellida.
The second part was published as "Antonios revenge".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
